snippet: Prime Minister Ahmet Davutoglu said a major ground offensive against targets in Iraq and Syria had killed nearly 200 militants over the last 48 hours.
abstract: Turkish Prime Min Ahmet Davutoglu claims military strikes against Islamic State in retaliation for recent Istanbul suicide bombing killed almost 200 militants.
lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Ahmet Davutoglu said a major ground offensive against targets in Iraq and Syria had killed nearly 200 militants over the last 48 hours.

headline.main: Turkey Strikes Islamic State Targets in Retaliation for Istanbul Bombing
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Europe; Turkey: Army Strikes ISIS Targets

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
